delete.label: Delete Reserved Alias
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this reserved alias?

emptyState.title: Create your first reserved alias
emptyState.description: Reserved aliases are aliases that will be forwarded to selected admin users. This is useful if you want to create aliases that are meant to be public, like contact@example.com or hello@example.com.

createNew.title: Create Reserved Alias
createNew.description: Define what alias should forward to whom.
